Key Match Events: Alexander-Arnold provided a great cross-field pass to dangerously free Grealish down the left late on
Alexander-Arnold hit a well-timed volley for England’s second goal
Kane managed to turn a blocked shot into a goal in the 89th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate picked a team of Euro 2024 hopefuls but few impressed enough to book a seat on the plane in a scrappy performance
Cole Palmer broke the deadlock from the penalty spot before Trent Alexander-Arnold doubled the home side’s advantage
Harry Kane received praise from Southgate for training well and being in good shape
Post-Match Reflections: Southgate expressed satisfaction with the team’s performance and the goals scored
Palmer and Eze were highlighted as players who performed well and strengthened their cases for the squad
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at St James' Park in Newcastle
The match was a warm-up friendly before the Euro 2024 tournament
